game.name: Akai Onna
game.shortDescription: Akai Onna | 赤い女 is a psychological J-horror game featuring a student.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Akai Onna | 赤い女 is a psychological J-horror game featuring a student.

reviewHighlights.text: A nice atmospheric, if short, horror game. Only issues I had were that there are no English subtitles as advertised so I had to rely on Google Lens to...
I will admit I got scared a few times but overall the quality was lacking, its alright if its on sale
